quote: Youth Spot Bar is an amazing organisation, YSB has endorsed me with outstanding working experience. No about doubt about recommending it to my colleagues and friends..
author: James Kasule

quote: A company who genuinely cares about young people in the community. Events are always well organised and a pleasure to be at. The Founder, Sekiyah has been a valued mentor to me and is truly inspirational!
author: Khadijah Taraji

quote: Whilst volunteering with Youth sports bar I have gained different skills that can be incorporated in my day-to-day life and work. It has been a great pleasure to work with YSB as I have gained long life experience. The teamwork at YSB is amazing and the roles are diverse!!!.
author: Kehinde Falana

quote: Beautiful people, fantastic atmosphere and brings people together! My kids love this place! I have also developed many skills while volunteering with Youth Spot Bar, such as communication, leadership, problem solving, and creativity.
author: Katherine Munoz

quote: I've been volunteering with YSB for a while now. I love the confidence they help you build up while working, as you get to have conversations with people/customers. There are a lot of things to do and a lot of skills to learn. The staff makes you feel welcome and are very helpful. I would advise anybody to join YSB and gain some work experience and knowledge.
author: Chantel Nyirenda

quote: It was my first time attending, I felt very apprehensive to begin with but that was quickly resolved because Sekiyah & her team created such a supportive & patient environment. Their encouragement, and genuine care for students is truly appreciated!
author: Sonja Crichlow

quote: I would like to say thank you so much to Sakiyah & her team, they were extremely supportive, kind. All of her team increased my sense of willingness & determination..
author: Tr'Nique (15)

quote: I would like to say thank you so much to Sakiyah & her team, they were extremely supportive, kind. All of her team increased my sense of willingness & determination.
author: Kellycia (13)

quote: I found the session to be really enjoyable! Sakiyah & her team was incredibly helpful and because of them I was able to learn how to skate. Although there were times I fell, Sakiyah's support & enthusiasm helped me get back up and keep going. Thank you!
author: Kaysant'e (15)

quote: My children love it, they love Sekiyah. Me personally as a mum I love how Sekiyah handles the children. She's fun, makes the kids feel confident, resilient, even my 4-year-old. They are also always looking forward to the next lesson. Our aim is to become creative and confident skaters and have lots of fun. Thanks Sekiyah.
author: Swabrah Kaseruuzi
